English: I have an important meeting tomorrow.
I need to buy some groceries on Monday.
French: Je dois acheter des provisions lundi.

English: She is visiting France next month.
French: Elle visite la France le mois prochain.

English: Could you please tell me the date of the concert?
French: Pourriez-vous me dire la date du concert, s'il vous plaît ?

English: I'm going to start a new job in February.
French: Je commence un nouveau travail en février.
